question: Earth can be viewed as an engine and heat exchange is part of the engine system. Which would be an example of a transfer of energy from the atmosphere to the lithosphere?
candidate_answers: (A) A volcano erupts in the state of Washington. (B) An earthquake takes place off the coast of Japan. (C) A wild fire scorches a prairie in the upper Midwest. (D) A hurricane moves from the Gulf of Mexico onto land.
answer: An earthquake takes place off the coast of Japan.
label: B
